landingPage.resumeText: Fascinated by computer science and its security challenges, I am orienting myself towards careers in cybersecurity. Creative and persistent, I enjoy tackling challenges in a team to address current issues in terms of computer security.

forensique.title: Forensics
forensique.contentText: Solid knowledge of the basic principles of computer forensics, including data acquisition methods, data analysis, and evidence presentation.

devsecops.title: DevSecOps
devsecops.contentText: Strong understanding of development, computer security, and regulatory compliance. Proficient in CI/CD, network security, and penetration testing.

pentesting.title: Pentesting
pentesting.contentText: Intrusion testing and common vulnerabilities. Reconnaissance, exploitation, post-exploitation, and reporting. Identification and remediation of vulnerabilities to ensure the security of systems and networks.

developpement.title: Development
developpement.contentText: Expertise in Java, Python, C++, JavaScript, Bash, Docker, and more. Advanced use of GitHub for version control and collaboration on personal and professional projects.

aboutMePage.title: WHOAMI
aboutMePage.paragraph_one: A fifth-year student at ISEN Lille, currently in a professional contract at Orange Cyberdefense as a CSIRT engineer.
aboutMePage.paragraph_two: An experienced cybersecurity engineer, passionate about data protection and computer security. With industry experience, I specialize in implementing robust security systems for companies of all sizes. I am also skilled in penetration testing, regulatory compliance, and security incident management. My goal is to provide advanced security solutions to help protect digital assets.
aboutMePage.paragraph_three: As a self-hosting advocate, I firmly believe that everyone should have complete control over their data and online services. That's why I specialize in hosting my own websites, applications, and services to avoid dependency on large online service providers. I enjoy sharing my knowledge and experiences with others to help them understand the benefits of self-hosting and to embark on the adventure. My goal is to make digital technology autonomy accessible to everyone.
